psalm.title: Book of Deuteronomy
psalm.text:
[[Dt 32,35c]]Close at hand is the day of their disaster
[[Dt 32,35d]]and their doom is rushing upon them!
[[Dt 32,36a]]Surely, the LORD shall do justice for his people;
[[Dt 32,36b]]on his servants he shall have pity.
[[Dt 32,39a]]"Learn then that I, I alone, am God,
[[Dt 32,39b]]and there is no god besides me.
[[Dt 32,39c]]It is I who bring both death and life,
[[Dt 32,39d]]I who inflict wounds and heal them.
[[Dt 32,41]]I will sharpen my flashing sword, 
and my hand shall lay hold of my quiver. 
"With vengeance I will repay my foes 
and requite those who hate me."

first_reading.title: Book of Nahum
first_reading.text:
[[Na 2,1]]See, upon the mountains there advances the bearer of good news, announcing peace! Celebrate your feasts, O Judah, fulfill your vows! For nevermore shall you be invaded by the scoundrel; he is completely destroyed.
[[Na 2,3]]The LORD will restore the vine of Jacob, the pride of Israel, Though ravagers have ravaged them and ruined the tendrils.
[[Na 3,1]]Woe to the bloody city, all lies, full of plunder, whose looting never stops!
[[Na 3,2]]The crack of the whip, the rumbling sounds of wheels; horses a-gallop, chariots bounding,
[[Na 3,3]]Cavalry charging, The flame of the sword, the flash of the spear, the many slain, the heaping corpses, the endless bodies to stumble upon!
[[Na 3,6]]I will cast filth upon you, disgrace you and put you to shame;
[[Na 3,7]]Till everyone who sees you runs from you, saying, "Nineveh is destroyed; who can pity her? Where can one find any to console her?"

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew
gospel.text:
[[Mt 16,24]]Jesus said to his disciples, â€œWhoever wishes to come after me must deny himself, take up his cross, and follow me.
[[Mt 16,25]]For whoever wishes to save his life will lose it, but whoever loses his life for my sake will find it.
[[Mt 16,26]]What profit would there be for one to gain the whole world and forfeit his life? Or what can one give in exchange for his life?
[[Mt 16,27]]For the Son of Man will come with his angels in his Father's glory, and then he will repay everyone according to his conduct."
[[Mt 16,28]]Amen, I say to you, there are some standing here who will not taste death until they see the Son of Man coming in his kingdom."
